title: "Nielsen Backtracks On Including Amazon Data To Thursday Night Football"
text: "After announcing it would be including Amazon's first-party data to Thursday Night Football games
source_name: Nielsen backtracked citing the MRC's non approval of the changeover."

title: "Tesla's stock busts through 50-DMA resistance into bull-market territory"
text: "Tesla Inc.'s bulls finally succeeded on Monday
source_name: after multiple attempts over nearly two weeks
date: to get the electric-vehicle giant's stock past upside technical resistance and into fresh bull-market territory."

title: "The 3 Most Undervalued EV Charging Stocks to Buy in September 2023"
text: "Countries across the globe are striving to have millions of electric vehicles on the road by the end of this decade. To achieve this goal
source_name: governments have laid out several initiatives and incentives."
